name: @oruga-ui/oruga
description: UI components for Vue.js and CSS framework agnostic
author: Walter Tommasi <tommsi20@gmail.com>

scripts.ci: npm run lint && cross-env NODE_ICU_DATA=node_modules/full-icu node --expose-gc ./node_modules/.bin/jest --logHeapUsage -u && codecov
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run unit
scripts.build:style: npm run build:scss && npm run build:scss-vars && npm run build:scss-full
scripts.build:scss-vars: sass src/scss/oruga-full-vars.scss | node ./build/banner.js > dist/oruga-full-vars.css && cleancss -o dist/oruga-full-vars.min.css dist/oruga-full-vars.css
scripts.build:scss-full: sass src/scss/oruga-full.scss | node ./build/banner.js > dist/oruga-full.css && cleancss -o dist/oruga-full.min.css dist/oruga-full.css
scripts.build:scss: sass src/scss/oruga.scss | node ./build/banner.js > dist/oruga.css && cleancss -o dist/oruga.min.css dist/oruga.css
scripts.build:lib: rimraf dist && npm run build:vue && npm run build:style
scripts.build:lib:watch: npm link && concurrently "npm run build:vue:watch" "npm run build:style:watch"
scripts.publish:lib: cp ../../README.md . && npm run build:lib && npm publish
